name: World Summit on Environmental Science and Engineering
content: About ENVIRONSUMMIT2024 It is a great pleasure for us to invite you to participate as speaker, delegate, sponsor and/or as exhibitor at the World Summit on Environmental Science and Engineering (ENVIRONSUMMIT2024), which will be held in Porto, Portugal during April 15-17, 2024\. We believe worldwide scientists and entrepreneurs in the field of environmental science will create huge opportunities by showcasing the growth and breakthrough of environmental science at a time when so many new innovations and challenges are available. The ENVIRONSUMMIT2024 is a dedicated conference where you will have the opportunity to learn about new developments and share aspects of your own work in the fields of environmental science and enginering by sharing poster works or oral presentations.
